description: This article explores the promise of ecosystem architecture, which blends decentralized systems with regenerative design to create sustainable and transformative solutions. It emphasizes the need to rethink traditional frameworks and practices to build resilient and interconnected communities, all while addressing social, economic, and environmental inequalities.
excerpt: Imagine a world where innovation enhances rather than harms the planet and its people. Ecosystem architecture blends decentralization and regenerative design for a sustainable future.
